## ğŸ”§ Configuration

Edit `appsettings.json` with your Amadeus API keys:
```json
{
  "AmadeusApi": {
    "ClientId": "YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    "ClientSecret": "YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET"
  }
}
```
